message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.SD, cs.LG, cs.AI

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CL (Computation and Language) - The paper deals with automatic speech recognition (ASR) systems, which is a subfield of natural language processing (NLP) and falls under the cs.CL category.
2. cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) - The paper uses images to adapt ASR systems, which involves computer vision techniques and falls under the cs.CV category.
3. cs.SD (Sound) - The paper deals with speech signals and their processing, which falls under the cs.SD category.
4. cs.LG (Machine Learning) - The paper uses machine learning techniques to develop multimodal ASR models, which falls under the cs.LG category.
5. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) - The paper deals with developing robust ASR systems using multimodal inputs, which falls under the broader category of artificial intelligence and falls under the cs.AI category.
